name: Jewel Pop!
description:
A highly addictive game ‘Jewel POP’ is free at your phone now!

Any feedback please give us a comment. If you like this game, don't forget to give us 5-star rating. Thanks very much for all your support in our games!

Jewel Pop is a very casual game with elements of unique mechanic and very easy-to-learn concept. Various bonuses levels, colorful graphics and smooth gameplay make it addictive, strategic and challenging fun for everyone, it’s a great way to kill time!

How to Play:
The task of the game is to clear the board by popping groups of 2 or more blocks of the same color, there is no time limit, the goal of the game is to clear more blocks in a single remove, reach the target points and proceed to next stage. The more blocks you pop, the more scores you will get.

Game includes:
(1) 5 different color of Jewels
(2) 4 varieties of Game props
(3) Very casual background music
(4) Endless game mode
(5) 4 mysterious game scenes for unlocking

If you like Pop Star, Pop cat or other elimination, puzzle, classic and educational kids games, you shouldn’t miss this game!
